message.original: 旋風の証 シーカー戦術試練
シーカーの基本戦術を学ぶため 修練の祠にて試練に挑む
message.translation: In order to learn the basic tactics of Seeker, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

message.original: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
message.translation: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel

message.original: 百裂斬りで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack an enemy with Scarlet Kisses

message.original: 敵の攻撃を転身で回避せよ
message.translation: Avoid enemy attacks with Forward Roll.

message.original: 敵にロープ投げを成功せよ
message.translation: Successfully hit an enemy with Rope Throw.

message.original: 最奥の敵にしがみついて乱斬りせよ
message.translation: Cling to the enemy in the inner sanctum, and attack it with Scarlet Slashes.

message.original: 最奥にある＜旋風の証＞を入手する
message.translation: Collect the proof of completing the trial

message.original: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
